artist: Painter: After Maarten de Vos; Engraver: Jan Sadeler I
description: Mary greeting her cousin Elizabeth in foreground Zachary and Joseph at right; dwellings at right distance; bridge over stream at left; city on hill left distance
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

in image lower right : Martin de vos inuietor / Ioann Sadler fecit Coloniae 1582  Cum gratia et priuill SCM / below image in black: Maria intrauit in domu Zachariae, & salutauit Elizabeth.  Et factum est vt adauit salutatione / Mariae Elizabeth, exultauit infans in vtero eius.  Luce capite 1
title: Mary Greeting Elizabeth
